testsuite.name: catererPages

testcase.name: It should allow caterer to login and navigate caterer to meal management page
It should allow caterer to edit a meal
It should not allow caterer to create a new meal
It should navigate to menu page and show caterer meals
It should show the caterer's menu for the day

failure.message: Testing if element <#accordion__body-1 > div:nth-child(2) > div > div:nth-child(1) > p> contains text: "plain rice with ground beef". Element could not be located.

testcase.name: It should allow the caterer to clear the menu for the day
It should add a meal to the menu cart if the meal's add to menu button is clicked
It should not add a meal to the menu cart if the meal has already been added to the menu cart
It should navigate to menu cart and post menu
It should show the new caterer's menu for the day
It should navigate to the caterer's dashboard
It should show order details when table row is clicked
